channel.title: live on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in live on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-20
item.description: The biggest announcements from Google’s Pixel 6 event (3 minute read) Google has finally revealed its Pixel 6 and Pixel 6 Pro phones.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-09-01
item.description: South Korea law forces Google and Apple to open up app store payments (3 minute read) Apple and Google are battling lawsuits and regulators around the world due to their app store rules.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-08-04
item.description: Facebook will host a paid movie premiere this month (2 minute read) Facebook will host the premiere of The Outsider, a documentary about the National 9/11 Memorial and Museum in New York City.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-07-29
item.description: SpaceX is almost ready to start turning Starship’s launch tower into ‘Mechazilla’ (3 minute read) SpaceX plans to use a giant tower with arms to catch its rockets.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-06-17
item.description: Apple has reportedly considered launching its own primary healthcare service (2 minute read) Apple has plans to launch a subscription-based healthcare service.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-02
item.description: Facebook is opening its experimental predictions app to all users (1 minute read) Forecast, Facebook’s community for crowdsourced predictions and collective insights, is now available for people in the US and Canada to participate in.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-27
item.description: Elon Musk promises demo of a working Neuralink device on Friday (2 minute read) Neuralink will demonstrate a working device on August 28.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-17
item.description: Microsoft to launch xCloud streaming free with Xbox Game Pass Ultimate in September (6 minute read) Microsoft will launch xCloud free to its Xbox Game Pass Ultimate subscribers in September.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-10
item.description: Google confirms new Nest smart speaker with official photo and video (1 minute read) Google has confirmed that it is working on a new Nest smart speaker.
